website_summaries.verdict: The top of the line Braun electric razor. It is not cheap, but if you want the absolute best, this is the one to get.
pros: Boasts 4 effective cutting elements including a powerful motor with impressive 40,000 per minute cross-cutting action
cons: Some testers noted that the shaver head has a bulkier design than the Series 7
It's also the most expensive model on our shortlist

customer_reviews.title: I was really excited to get this shaver as I've ...
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get this shaver as I've been using Norelco's for 40 years. I've bought many German based products (BMW, Mercedes, etc.) and have always experienced superb quality and reliability. This shaver fell apart nine months after purchase. I emailed Braun three weeks ago and no response. I'm actually going to toss it in the trash as I don't have to spend many hours to go through the hassle of sending it in to get fixed...my time is very limited. Using my old reliable Norelco... I actually have tow of them, both over 10 years old! DO NOT BUY THIER PRODUCTS, THIER QUALITY IS NOT THERE, AND THEIR CUSTOMER SERVICE NEEDS A LOT OF HELP.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Crazy Overpriced, lousy shave
customer_reviews.text: Takes forever to shave with this. to get anything like a close shave you have to go back and forth, over and over, in six different directions and it still leaves noticeable stubble. It won't touch fine, longer hairs on the neck. I can get better, quicker shaves with dollar store disposable blades than the best this can do. I can't believe they think this thing is worth over $200. I feel royally shafted by this purchase. They must pay well for the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: rswager

customer_reviews.title: The worse purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed with this purchase. I bought it on July 6th for my husband. Now, since 3 days ago the shaver is not working and has no warranty. So... Basically we threw $250.00 to the trash can! So upset! The battery is fully charged and it is locked, and it does not unlock by pressing the button.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Plastic, overly-shiny finish looks much cheaper/flimsier than 7 series ...
customer_reviews.text: Plastic, overly-shiny finish looks much cheaper/flimsier than 7 series predecessor but the biggest complaint is how large the shaving surface is. Actually, the entire shaver is too large. It's far too wide, which makes shaving around a beard awkward. Plus the balance is off -- it just feels badly weighted/balanced in the hand. Definitely not worth the outrageous amount of money they are getting for it. I prefer the older, less costly 7 series.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Too pricey for the mediocre job it provides.
customer_reviews.text: I've given this item about a month now to fully acclimate to the shaving process. It really doesn't do that incredible of a job, but I'd be able to let that go if it produced consistent results. As of right now, I'm going over my face with the razor and then cleaning up the job it leaves with a regular razor. For the pricepoint, this is incredibly unnecessary.
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item as a bday gift and it does not work! It was not worth the money. It leaves my husband with unshaved patches around his neck no matter how many times he goes over it with the Braun shaver. To have a clean look he still has to use a regular razor. It was unreturnable and the money back guarantee is a joke. I am left with a piece of garbage and $250+ short. So disappointed in the quality of this Braun shaver and Amazon's unwillingness to help (even within the return window).
customer_reviews.author: Cin H

customer_reviews.title: Head and Face Approved!!!
customer_reviews.text: I never thought an electric razor could handle my face and head until I purchased this razor. My facial hair is very coarse and what’s left of the hair on my head is about the same. It powered through with a total shave time of 15-20min max. I have the wet/dry model and have used it dry. I have yet to see any excessive bumping or irritation. I’ve been using a regular razor my whole life so I’m sure my skin has a certain tolerance. My regular razor would cause bumps all the time! I HIGHLY recommend this razor it’s worth the cost after the first use!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good razor if you can buy it
customer_reviews.text: Huge upgrade from previous model Pros: Cuts cleanly and evenly cuts close compared to other razors Cleaning box works very well Cons: pretty dang expensive- might have to sell first born son Refill packages are fairly expensive.
customer_reviews.author: shjr

customer_reviews.title: Overall poor considering price paid.
customer_reviews.text: Not user friendly. No decent directions on its use especially the cleaner cartridges. Does not shave as well as the razor I got rid of .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for - an excellent shaver
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant to spend this much money on a shaver but I am really glad I did. Gives me a fantastic shave, wet or dry. I love the convenience of being able to travel without having to take along shaving cream. Great coverage, no irritation to the skin. I particularly like it in the shower. Recharging and cleanup is a breeze with the automated system. Have had it for about two months now and have had zero problems. 10/10 highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AlexO

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't shave any better than my $39.00 Phillips Norelco body groomer.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a great electric shaver. After reading numerous Amazon and internet reviews I decided to try this razor. I gave it an honest try, followed all the instructions, but it didn't shave my face any closer than my $39.00 Phillips Norelco body groomer electric shaver. Very disappointed especially for what it cost. NOTE: When I tried to return this item it showed that due to it having a flammable liquid (the cleaning solution) I couldn't return the item. I contacted Amazon and they are refunding me my purchase price and they told me to dispose of the item. That's GREAT customer service.
customer_reviews.author: michael macelli

customer_reviews.title: I'll continue to shave
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping that this would be a quality replacement for my shaving routine, but unfortunately, it doesn't seem to work very well. It seems to get close where it actually cuts the hair, but it misses hair sparatically and I have to stand there for 3x the amount of time it would take to shave to make sure it gets everything. Amazon won't take returns on this product either which is disappointing since from my perspective it doesn't do what it claims to do. Seems to be high quality, the materials are nice, stand and cleaner works well.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Life Braun Shaver User
customer_reviews.text: I have had this shaver for almost one year now. My shaving time has doubled since I stopped using my series 7. After each save, I have to look very closely into a mirror to check what the shaver has missed. This shaver by far is the worse Braun shaver I have ever owned. Over the years, I helped many people to convert to Braun shavers, now I am doing the opposite.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Turns on and off by itself and locks
customer_reviews.text: Bought this shaver 6/7/19. Worked until 9/17/19. Now it turns on and off by it self. Called Braun service and they offered to: 1. Have me send the shaver in for repair, might take 10 to 14 days. 2. Send me a Series 6 shaver as a temporary replacement, after I told them I needed to have more that every 1 to 2 weeks, and send the shaver in for repair. I am ineligible for refund because my purchase was more than 90 days ago. Decided to just trash the shaver and the 6 new cleaner replacement cartridges and replacement head. Braun will stand by their devices just not in the most convenient way. Buyer Beware!!!
customer_reviews.author: John Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Been Using Braun For Over 30 Years!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using a Braun shaver for over 30 years. I was in the hotel business and had to shave twice a day. My older mentor told me to "buy a Braun they're the best!" I've used on ever since. This new model attracted my attention since it was more advanced than my current one. (Keeping for backup.) It's true....it shaves wonderfully and I got a super close shave in half time I usually take! Quiet, light and precise. I don't understand the guys who panned this other than they don't "get" electric shavers. So far, I couldn't be more pleased! Five stars for this one. Go Braun, still the best in shave technology!!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Hackman

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality, doesn't get all the hair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shaver because it was highly recommended and I read that it was great for preventing hair growing back in the skin. I was looking for a quality shaver to quickly trim my neck and occasionally full face; however after using this a couple dozen times, it never gives me a clean shave. Wet or dry I always have hair left over, sometimes even long enough I could pluck them with my fingers. It's a good quality build and feels nice just doesn't seem to work for me. Very disappointing. The photo was from my 3rd shave. I mainly use this as a "pre" shave and go back with a razor to finish.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Cost is way to high
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend, for a shaver of this price I expected a flawless shave and I got any but. After several passes still had tons of hair left. I have used razor a fraction of the price that did a much better job. Will be trying to return this.
customer_reviews.author: Owens

customer_reviews.title: Mine will not give me a clean shave!
customer_reviews.text: On March 21st I purchased a Braun Series 9 Style 9370. Its performance is below the standards of Braun. After using it since March 21 it has never given me a good shave. Its as though it only cuts half the hair and leaves the rest. I decided to take out my Series 7 and see if I was correct. I was! With my Series 7 I get a much closer shave. I am extremely disappointed especially having spent that much money on what I though would surpass the series 7 in performance.
customer_reviews.author: S. West

customer_reviews.title: It's excellent
customer_reviews.text: It's excellent. I've been searching for a while for a good electric shaver. My search included Panasonic, Philips Norelco, Remington and past Braun models. I was currently using a Norelco 3D that was OK, but really took a long time. If this Braun hadn't worked out I was considering going back to a blade. This Braun Series 9 shaver provides a quick and smooth shave. Also, it allows me to skip a few days. That was an issue with other models that would end up tugging at hairs that got a bit too long. I was hesitant with the price but wish I had purchased this earlier. I'm completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt catch it all
customer_reviews.text: I liked the build, charging/cleaning doc and the "promise" that visuals gave. After using it for 30 days, I can say that it is an okay shaver. It doesnt catch my neck hair so I have to use a traditional razor to get them all. Also, dry functions worse, so I have to use foam (or a lengthier process) to get somewhat satisfaction from it. Considering its price, it is not worth it. I would have returned it, but I thought its dry function will at least be somewhat useful when I am in a rush and looking like crap.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mohan

customer_reviews.title: A step up from the Series 7
customer_reviews.text: I've had the Series 5, the 7 and now the 9. The 9 lasts longer on a charge, shaves closer, is wet&dry. The long-hair trimmer between the shaver heads works FAR better than any electric I've ever used. This is the first electric that will cut through my weekend beard on a Monday morning. The trimmer is fairly good for nose hair, ear hair, and any long strays on your face. My only complaint is that the new design of the clean-and-charge station is a bit of a step down. The display is not intuitive and there's only one button... read the manual so you know what it's trying to tell you.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher S. Cornette

customer_reviews.title: Expensive isn’t always better.
customer_reviews.text: My husband used the razor four weeks. He followed the directions to the letter on cleaning and care. The razor started leaving whiskers and skipped spots on his face. I thought this highly rated razor which costs almost $300 would be better than his Philco $75 razor. Not so!!
customer_reviews.author: Nonna

customer_reviews.title: Shave declined substantially within 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I need to shave daily and with most everything I read this was the cats meow. Unfortunately I travel a lot and I was out of town during the final days to return this razor. It started out being the best shave ever but with in a 2 month window I can honestly say it is a disappointment. Because I missed the window to return the product I will continue to use it but, if in the next 2 months it continues down this path it will be put in the closet to collect dust because I can’t toss a $200+ item in the trash 4 months after purchase. Oh well live and learn.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Best Braun razor you can buy
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best all around available. I have a nasty tough beard. This shaver tackles it very well. Prior to this I had the 7000 series Braun for about 5 years. This is definitely an upgrade. Easier shave with more hair removal with less passes. Good battery life on par with the previous models. Not so easy to clean the shaver head unless you have the model that comes with the Clean and Charge station which I'd recommend over the model without.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor Rich

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Shaver - Braun does it again
customer_reviews.text: Great shaver! I've had several Braun shavers over the years. They always seem pricey but they never fail to deliver. Even the low-end AA battery versions are solid. This one was probably the first to surprise me since my original 25 years ago. It is a work horse. Done shaving in minutes and catches everything - everything! After 2 weeks the battery indicator only dropped one bar. The whole kit is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Gets as close as a regular razor!
customer_reviews.text: I used to use a normal razor to shave. This gets me a closer and smoother shave than my five blade razor did. If someone told me that I wouldn’t believe it. Getting the cleaning/lubricating station package is a must! Like all electric razors, it doesn’t do so good on longer hairs (4-5 day growth) so I recommend not going more than a few days without shaving. The battery last long enough for me to shave my face and head. I do remove the razor head and tap out built up hair before putting it back on the charger/cleaning station.
customer_reviews.author: Louisiana Boy

customer_reviews.title: Inferior to disposable razors, at least for me.
customer_reviews.text: Well, based on the reviews here and online I thought i'd be able to get at least a halfway decent shave from a $250 electric razor but unfortunately that doesn't seem to be the case. It takes me nearly 3 times as long to shave and the results are only about half as good as my old disposable razors.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Excellent electric razor
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace an aging six year-old Braun Series 3 model that I thought worked very well and for which I had purchased replacement heads yearly. This one is vastly better -- the best electric shaver I have ever used. It shaves closer, more comfortably and more quickly than any one I have used previously. I don't know how it might compare to Series 7, but I do think it was worth the expense (especially at the Black Thursday price). The cleaning dock is an extravagance but works well,. I am using it only once a week or so and that seems to be enough for cleaning and charging. Very satisfied with it. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: John P. Mordes

customer_reviews.title: Happy with upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I solely purchased this because my 7-Series of 9-years was starting to fall apart. Due to my job I must shave everyday and that means I used it a lot. I would have purchased another 7-Series but those have been discontinued. Trust has been built therefore it's time to upgrade and go with the newest, latest, and greatest. It has now been around 60-days of use and I'm just as happy with the 9 as I was with the 7. It took a few times to get comfortable with the side trimmer, but it works great. Pretty confident this 9-series will last just as long and do a great job for the next 9+ years.
customer_reviews.author: D44E

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: I could spend 200 bucks much better that I did here. It works on my face... not on my Neck. I still have to touch up my neck with a razor. I did a lot of research before I bought this one. I think they bought all those reviews because it doesn't work as good as a $50 norelco. However... I paid 200 bucks for this stupid thing so I'm using it!
customer_reviews.author: BMX NINJA

customer_reviews.title: No Returns
customer_reviews.text: I get it, no return because it's a personal grooming devices but then again all you need to do is replace the blade. Now the Shaver itself is garbage, I have to clean up after the shaver with a razor because it misses too many hairs... Also it takes loner than shaving with a straight razor... A giant waste of money tbh...
customer_reviews.author: ZvzzBzzdy

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this product. More so because I really wanted to love it. It looks, and feels almost worthy of its price tag, unfortunately it is not a comfortable shave. While shaving, I could feel the shaver pulling on my stubble. Going to order a simple shaver that doesn't hurt the face and pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Rohan

customer_reviews.title: quickly shave with the braun shaver
customer_reviews.text: This shaver allows me to shave within 2 minutes my chin hair and prevent me from developing a covid beard. It cleans 95% of the hair on my chin in a timely manner. The other 5% i use a blade to clean that. It takes very long to remove those hair usiong this shaver so i use a combination of the two technologies. Also recently i am using it to get a hair cut using the hair trimmer on the back of the shaver from my wife, due to covid 19 and not allowed to visit a barber. So it is serving its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Murtuza Hashim

customer_reviews.title: IT DOESN'T WORK AND YOU CAN'T RETURN IT
customer_reviews.text: We just tried it for the first time at home. We followed all the instructions properly, we just never used the cleaning system. It doesn't shave a hair on my husband's beard - it doesn't do ANYTHING! And AMAZON won't accept a return - I'm in the process of trying to figure out how to get my money back. We've been stolen from. Nowhere on the item page does it say you can't return this item. It even ships with prime. BUYER BEWARE!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharlini Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Only works well on my face, not my neck
customer_reviews.text: This razor only does half the job well. I get a real close clean shave on my face but no matter how hard I try I cannot get the same results on my neck or just below my jawline. Since I’ve spent the money I’ve decided to keep using the Braun on my face but will go back to my inexpensive Wahl for my neck.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan John Pike

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is like buying expensive tickets to a concert then the artist gives a sucky performance. Or paying for a Porsche and getting a Ford engine. This is so overpriced for what it does. Takes way toooooooooooooo many passes before it gets smooth. Sometimes I get tired of it, I end up just using my Schick razor.
customer_reviews.author: ZAY

customer_reviews.title: Returned it, not even trimmed my tough beard
customer_reviews.text: I have a tough beard, grows fast so I have to shave every other day for work. I tried razors , currently using match 3, changing cartridge at every 3rd shave ( people use this for more than a month so imagine my beard) . My first experience with an automated shaver. I ordered the most expensive and advanced one at the moment of ordering but it didn’t work at all. Not even trimmed my beard , very disappointed and returned it. I went back to match 3 and match 5, I tried all settings none of them even trimmed my 2-3 day old beard
customer_reviews.author: Kaan

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it.
customer_reviews.text: He had the older Braun razor that cleaned like this one but it was getting hard to find the razor parts and cleaning fluid for it. It sounded like it was on its last leg when he shaved, so he got this one to replace it. He LOVES it. Said it shaves better than his old one and when it cleans it, it is not as loud. I could hear his old one from the other room, I don't know when he cleans this one. Said it was well worth the money. It gets all of the little hairs on his neck and chin that the old one never got.
customer_reviews.author: Grand Lodge

customer_reviews.title: This razor is amazing
customer_reviews.text: It is not your basic priced razor but it is well designed and shaving is very comfortable. The razor also has a stand which works as a charging and even cleaning station. You don't have to use the cleaning solution ( if you want to save money but it is a great way to have the razor cleaned well ), you can run the head under hot water as an alternative. I never had a better electric razor, and I had Braun razor before, but not like this one. Well worth the money if you are after a quality razor and great shaving experience.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, close shave!
customer_reviews.text: I have used an electric razor most of my life and tried several different brands over the years. The Braun Series 9 is by far the best electric razor have ever used. It gives a smooth, close shave without repeatedly going over the same area and as a result of not having to go over the same area three of four times, there is no irritation. I never owned a self-cleaning electric razor before. That is a nice feature and it works really well. I would not hesitate to recommend this razor to anyone who asked.
customer_reviews.author: Tony M

customer_reviews.title: This razor cuts me, leaves rashes on my face, and doesn't trim hair under my jaws
customer_reviews.text: I had an older version of Braun for years and it was great. This Series 9 is terrible. For a year I use it just to trim around my nose and lips, did the rest with my gillette razor/blade. During covid outbreak I didn't want to use blades so I started shaving my whole face with the Bruan series 9 and it has been the worst razor I ever used, and I am 64 years old. Now I'm past the warranty phase and realize I wasted $50 on a defective product. I am not happy
customer_reviews.author: Robert F.

customer_reviews.title: Be Careful Before And Read Amazon's The Policy Before You Order
customer_reviews.text: I watched many you tube videos and read the several reviews and ended up spending $200.00 + on this shaver and it will not even cut one hair. When I was trying to decide on which shaver to purchase, I was told to purchase the Panasonic instead of the Braun by several people and I did not listen. I now own the Panasonic and it does a perfect job. This Braun is just expensive. I chatted with an Amazon rep and they basically said tough luck as this item is not refundable, so in the trash it will go. Read Amazon's policy about returns before you take the plunge like I did.
customer_reviews.author: Slvrwolf

customer_reviews.title: TEARS MY SKIN
customer_reviews.text: I have only used the razor 4-5 times. Each time I use it, I have to wait several days to let my skin heal. I get a terrible razor burn. I spent so much money on this razor so I cannot give or throw it away. Hopefully, the company will see this email and help me out.
customer_reviews.author: R in Seguin

customer_reviews.title: Great if you like stubble
customer_reviews.text: I don't see how this is supposed to replace a real razor. It leaves visible stubble on my face, wet or dry, no matter how many passes I make. I've made my face red trying to make this work for me, especially when I discovered I can't return the thing because of some flammable liquid policy Amazon has. So I have a $300 electric razor that doesn't give me the close shave of my $8 double edge razor. Brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Loser Baby

customer_reviews.title: Amazing razor; charge and clean is delicate
customer_reviews.text: As far as the razor goes, this is excellent. Fast, comfortable, close shave. It travels well, holds its charge, and the foil has been going strong now a year. My only complaint is the charge and clean station. It worked beautifully for about three months, then was left in a closet at home and not used for several months of travel. Upon coming back to it, I've found that it no longer works. It whirls and charges, but it will no longer feed the cleaning solution up into the razor. The clean and charge was a big draw with this razor, so it's rather disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth F.

customer_reviews.title: Great razor, great investment
customer_reviews.text: I was cautious investing so much into this razor. In reading the reviews, either people love or they want their old lower series version. Just got the razor last night, and after charging it up, tried it. Am going going from a tri head electric razor system, and this product out performed like a sports car doing donuts around a bicycle. The shave is closer, smoother and no irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Huff

customer_reviews.title: Misleading advertising and confusing model numbers don't help customers
customer_reviews.text: I like it. But I'm confused on the display. The literature does not discuss the LED bars or a digital display. But I did just see in the ad that it suggests a 5 step countdown (LED Bars?) then displays the last "9" min of shaving time. So is Braun using the 9 display to correlate with the "Series 9"? But confusing the customers? Probably! 50min cordless shaving The state-of-the-art Li-Ion battery keeps performance and fully recharges in one hour. The premium display counts down the remaining battery time with 5 different steps and counts down the last 9 min. of shaving time.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Bosker

customer_reviews.title: Each generation of the Braun shaver gets better.
customer_reviews.text: Each generation of the Braun electric razor gets better and better. This series 9 has a beautiful design done in shiny and matte chrome, and black matte non slip plastic. It’s easy to hold and maneuver around your neck, chin and face. The most notable features are the shaving head with a variety of four cutters, and the trimmer which has been moved to the back with a simple and sturdy slide device. All this results in a very close shave in a shorter time than the previous models. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: BigHemi

customer_reviews.title: Save yourself the money. Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: My husband had a heart attack and had to be on blood thinners. One of the requirements is no razors in case of nicks. So after much research he bought this. He wanted to like it but found it wouldn’t get some spots at all and the spots it did get had to go over 10-20 times. Highly disappointed especially for a $250 shaver. Would never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel W.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!  Over priced and stuff doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: The razor still leaves uncut hairs. This razor came with a cleaning/charging station and it didn’t work. The company says it takes 6-8 weeks to replace. Really? For this high price razor there should be no defects and service should be way better. Do not buy. Not only does it not cut all hairs but equipment doesn’t even work.
customer_reviews.author: Lawdog309

customer_reviews.title: Braun shaver
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase this shave because Ive been very disappointed with last two very expensive shavers I bought. I read the reviews and some people thought it was noisy, cheap, and not a good shave. I can honestly say that this is the nicest shaver I have ever bought. It is not noisy, made well with a good feel with some weight to it. Its only 6 months old and hoping it doesn't prove me wrong. Someone gave good advise that you should remove the cleaner bottle and cap between cleaning so it doesn't evaporate, good idea. I would recommend this shaver to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: douglas braun

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this Shaver
customer_reviews.text: Shaver is not well built, materials and build quality feel cheap/poor and the shaving head is flimsy and thin. Shavings fall out all over the countertop when shaving, regardless of how the shaver is held, and it takes numerous passes to completely shave an area, even though it's only one-day of growth. Definitely avoid this shaver and look elsewhere. I'm stuck with this one because they don't accept returns.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not nearly as good a shaver as my old Series 5
customer_reviews.text: 1. There's no cover for the shaving head when not the shaver isn't in use 2. The on/off button and locking slider are placed on the handle is such a way that I sometimes accidentally press one or the other while shaving 3. Having to reach around to the back of the shaver to activate the pop-up trimmer is inconvenient 4. The trimmer does not work very well 5. The shaver does not handle longer hairs as well as my old one did
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Worth The Price
customer_reviews.text: There seems to be some confusion over the three choices of the 9 shaver. Bottom line,all are the same,just cosmetics. A more expensive model features a leather case for travel. Only the CC includes the cleane/charger,the other model only has a standing charger. Also this 9 cleaner/charger will not work with any other Braun shaver. I found it superior to my 7 shaver. More quiet, closer shave. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerJohn C

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I try this sooner? I love this shaver!
customer_reviews.text: I have for over 10 years only bought and used Norelco shavers from Costco. I was sick of the bad job my latest one was doing and decided to try a new one outside of my normal $100 price range. While this one was much more expensive, it does a much better job. So it's possible buying a much more expensive Norelco might give the same results. Although I am not willing to go and try that since I'm 100 percent satisfied with this one. There is my personal experience and my two cents.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Don't Hesitate to Buy this 9290CC Shaver
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for the past nine months. I absolutely love it. (Shaved with a Norelco for over 10 years which also by the way was a great product until they turned it into a plastic piece of junk. Which is why I switched to the Braun) I whole heartedly recommend this shaver. It gives me a great shave and I do put it in the cleaning solution every day. Always smells clean, fresh and ready to go. You can use it before or after your shower, makes no difference in your quality of shave. Always excellent. I use a pre-shave lotion every day which I have always used.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Not shaving properly
customer_reviews.text: I bought that for my husband for his birthday and that was terrible mistake. It suppose to be for sensitive skin. He tried wet and dry shaving and every time is the same. It leaves traces of hair on his neck or more difficult places all the time. Couple times when he was trying to remove it with the electric razor it cached his skin and cut it. His skin is terrible irritated after that and still needs you use regular razor. I tried to return it but so far I was on 2 different chats with representative and I can't resolve that problem. Overall, I do not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna W.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome upgrade from 5-series!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using a 5 series for years and it finally died (RIP little buddy). This shaver is awesome! Maybe I have been suffering or maybe it's just that good, but either way, the 9 series purs, doesn't snag at all, feels super comfortable in my hand and most importantly provides a super smooth shave. Happy Christmas to me. I watched the price for a couple weeks with a browser and on and waited until it was 250 vs 300. Amazon also had a coupon for 30, which negated SC taxes.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonInSC

customer_reviews.title: Good shaver but too delicate
customer_reviews.text: The shave experience is good although awkward on the neck. However, big problem in terms of durability. As you’ll see in the picture, a bit of the foil chipped off. At first I couldn’t understand why I was getting cut - then I noticed the chip. Only thing I can imagine is that it happened when the head fell off the counter as I was cleaning it. That’s way too delicate for real world use. (The cleaning unit does not work well)
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Feigenbaum

customer_reviews.title: Love this shaver.  The self cleaning bit is a bit of a gimmick though.  Ditch it after...
customer_reviews.text: Love this shaver. The self cleaning bit is a bit of a gimmick though. Ditch the self-cleaner after a cartridge or two as they're expensive and don't clean as well as manually and with hand soap + 5 minutes. Do have the open-ended silver section pointed up though as that more effectively catches stray long hairs that get missed if after the brass section. Learned that the hard way after several OK shaves. I seriously recommend having a can of shaver lubricant as well as that reduces pulling significantly.
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This thing.... it just isnt very good. It takes easily twice the amount of time as a regular shave, it doesn't shave anywhere in the same universe as close as a regular shave. Nics the hell out of my face and pulls anything over a days growth. Save your money, and you can't return it through amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best and closest shave.
customer_reviews.text: The razor is quick even after three to four days without shaving. As close as a regular soap razor and the best I have ever experienced and cleanup is easy with the accompanying cleaner. Great machine and worth the extra expense to purchase it. I did not use gel or shaving cream and it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: mjb

customer_reviews.title: OK but prefer older model 8995
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was upgrading from my years old 8995 with the same head as a 5 series to help get flattened hairs as advertised. It works but not as good as the 8995 I think due to the 9 series head tilting too much vs holding the side in place to get items as needed. I've had to use the trimmer much more already in a couple weeks on the 9 series than I would in an entire year with the 8995.
customer_reviews.author: Andy S

customer_reviews.title: Good , Comfortable close shave 9370CC
customer_reviews.text: I have been using electric razors now for 30 + years. My last razor before the 9370 was a series 5-5090, which was my first Braun razor. The series 5 did the job but I always had to get the spots I missed with a disposable razor plus the 5 series was loud. I also tried a Panasonic ARC5 eslv 95. The Panasonic gave a close shave but not near as comfortable as the 9 series. It would leave some razor burn. Not with the Braun. Well worth the extra $. I would definitely recommend this razor. Finally a razor that gives a close and comfortable shave.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Loy

customer_reviews.title: Item received does not match the picture description
customer_reviews.text: The picture depicts a travel case of leather but I received a travel case of nylon (I already have the same shaver with a travel case of nylon), this time it was bought for my dad and he always wanted a leather Travel bag. I took an hour to explain these situations to the customer service. As a result, there was no refund, no exchange, and no discount. Instead, I was asked to contact the manufacturer directly. I was so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: disappointing performance
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and overall have been disappointed. I'm military and therefor have to have a clean shave every day. I bought this hoping it would cut down on shaving time and help get rid of razor burn. When I used this I still had to go back over my face with a shaving razor because this razor leaves a lot of stubble. therefor me having to go back over my face to get a clean shave I didn't save any time and still have some, though not as bad, razor burn. over all I was very disappointed for the price I paid for this razor.
customer_reviews.author: Ryne O.

customer_reviews.title: I thought that buying an expensive shaver will guarantee a close shave...
customer_reviews.text: it shaves fine on my face, but doesn't do so well on my neck. i tried shaving wet/dry and changing directions ect but after numerous disappointing shaves, i purchased a Phillips razor for $40 (which worked better for me than this one)
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great razor- smooth shave
customer_reviews.text: Expensive unit to buy. Case will not fit unit and charger but protects the unit. Cleaner works well. I suggest buying a 5 pack of the cleaner to keep on hand. They do not last that long. Replacement blades are very expensive. The razor gives a nice clean shave and I am happy with that. Having all different razors over the years, this one is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Greg S.

customer_reviews.title: Shaving head breakdown - every 4-6 months
customer_reviews.text: I have experienced breakage of the shaving head every 4-6 months, with regular once-per-day usage. It seems the actual cost of the unit will be the purchase cost plus an additional ~$100 per year for replacing the foil head unit, approximately twice per year. The device is excellent, otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Return shaver
customer_reviews.text: Does not shave close at all. Don't get a close save with dry face or with with electric shave lotio. Have a 5 series, which I have went back to using. Would like to return this 9 series, and look for a different razor. I know the return date has expired, but I just got home from 2 weeks fishing in Canada. Thanks,
customer_reviews.author: larry f. green

customer_reviews.title: A close shaver
customer_reviews.text: A close shaver. Comparing my Norelco to the Braun, the Norelco felt smoother to my face when shaving. The Braun cleaner/recharger is a bit over engineered. Cleaning the shaver can be achieved by simply removing the head from the body and running both parts through hot water, allowing them to dry then oilying the head with Braun oil. I recommend just buying the shaver without the cleaning device.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G Babyak

customer_reviews.title: Not as cool as described!
customer_reviews.text: N0T the "9000" series hype I was expecting :( I like to shave every day & this 9000 was no better or quicker than my old 7000 series. Same cleaning cartridges was a plus & the cleaning machine was much quieter, but brushing out the removable head was a P@!N compared to my 7000 & the side burn trimmer wasnt nearly as convenient. I ended up returning it & Amazon was amazing about that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good.... Cuts mediocre
customer_reviews.text: The design of the unit and the features are nice.... But they simply lost what a shaver is supposed to do, cut... This one cuts worse than my 10 year old model from the same company. It also gives me razor burn and the head lock does not completely lock as the older models do. When in the lock position, with a little pressure the head moves.
customer_reviews.author: BAM BAM

customer_reviews.title: Great self clean
customer_reviews.text: Great shaver with a washing/drying charging dock. Everything you would want from a shaver. Everything about it is great except I feel like it has a hard time getting some of my hair on my face. Spend a lot of time just trying to get everything and it misses even longer hairs. Seems to work best on stubbles or thick hairs
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! This thing is unbelievable! I have a tough beard and soft skin, and it shaves so closely and smoothly that it's really difficult to describe! Worth every penny and then some! BTW: as the cleaning station is fully automatic, even in determining how much cleaning the razor needs, I only clean/charge it every 2 or 3 shaves.... Perfection!
customer_reviews.author: WCS

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Razor!!
customer_reviews.text: It's a GREAT razor - and you will pay a great price for it. If it holds up as long as advertised it will be worth it. Cuts far better and faster than other electric razors. Doesn't cut as close as a standard razor but that's to be expected. I had buyers remorse for the first few weeks but now I feel it was worth it. I would recommend this razor.
customer_reviews.author: TN Colby

customer_reviews.title: My 5 series broke after 10 years. This 9 series is like wow
customer_reviews.text: Disclaimer is that I shave once a week because my hair doesn't grow that far or fast. So my 5 series lasted for 10 strong gears and finally the beard trimmer broke. I could have fixed that part but it lasted for 10 years so I figure it's about time. I read the reviews side to go with us 9-series. The shaves are as clean, close and as nice as the barbershop sometimes even better. Bottom line: I would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Best shave I’ve ever had.
customer_reviews.text: For approx 20 years I used rotary electric shavers. A few weeks ago as I was about due to change out my blades I decided to upgrade to this electric razor instead. What a HUGE difference in closeness this one is compared to every rotary shaver I’ve ever had. I especially like the fact that this one also sanitizes and dries itself in the charger base station.
customer_reviews.author: Ynot

customer_reviews.title: Best shaver available
customer_reviews.text: What’s to say, Braun makes good shavers and this is the best one yet. Hint: to save your Clean and Renew cartridges... keep an old one, even an empty one in the base. Keep the one you use sealed and change them out when you clean it. If you clean a few times a month or even weekly, the cartridge will last months, over 6 months for me. If you clean every day.. never mind, 😊
customer_reviews.author: J. Bowles

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shaver
customer_reviews.text: I am 70 and been using electric shaver since 27. Have to say I was hesitant to pay this much. I said oh well I got it. I have to say I didn't shave for 3 days to really see how well this worked. OMG it is the best. Over a week now and same charge.i do my face and head daily and again the best. Expensive yes worth it yes.
customer_reviews.author: Tgillard

customer_reviews.title: Its junk, two stars for good customer service
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this razor for my husband to replace his old one from the same brand, it is cheap made if you compare to the old one taking into consideration the price you are paying. Walmart sells $50 razor for the same quality. Razor part pulls the hair and the trimmer came defective. Had to request a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Paty_bn3

customer_reviews.title: Love the smooth cut
customer_reviews.text: Bought this almost a year ago. It get used at least once a week, every time it leaves my husband's head smooth. Its clean itself easily with just a push of a button. It even lets you know when the cleaner needs to be changed. That too is easy to do, again just a push of a button. With the weekly use we are just now needing to order new heads for this. Would recommend this product to anyone who is wanting a clean smooth cut.
customer_reviews.author: Furry M.

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband. He was switching from a regular blade and loves this! An electric shaver was recommended from a friend who also had coarse thick beard hair. We were skeptical, but this has been a life changer. No longer so irritated after a shave. He can shave two days in a row without having a bleeding neck. Highly recommend this shaver.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality but doesn't have the best trimmer
customer_reviews.text: I want to give this five stars but I just can't because I some minor complaints: a) I still have to use my old clippers for two things: (i) to trim my mustache above my upper lip, and (ii) to make the edges straight on my beard. b) the battery lasts a long time but not as long as I expected (as advertised). c) it's big (especially with the charger) and is not the best for small toiletry bags.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony S.

customer_reviews.title: Braun shaver
customer_reviews.text: You have to go over. and over.and over your head to get these to work.are they smooth yes because they ain't cutting any thing!for 300 dollars I and you should expect MORE.NO WAY!!!back to razors again 😏
customer_reviews.author: BIG RUSS

customer_reviews.title: Recieved this recently
customer_reviews.text: Braun has deal in place that makes it unable to return this item, even unopened, for any reason. It is marked as a Prime item, but just be very sure your okay making the purchase, even knowing if it is broken, a gift exchange, etc. You will not be allowed to return it, and no explanation will be provided. It's important customers are allowed to know this because it doesn't say so anywhere that I can see.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph L Olson

customer_reviews.title: A Mercedes-Benz for your face
customer_reviews.text: Best electric razor I've ever owned, well worth the price. My third Braun since the 90s and this is by far the best. I'm done with safety razors and disposables forever after this, it's so close that a regular shave isn't worth the hassle, unless that's just your thing, in which case you aren't going to be buying an electric anyway. Cleaning station works perfectly. Well built, no irritation, trimmer well designed, head movement and locking switch is smooth and sturdy. Had this over six months now and no regrets whatsoever. Go for it.
customer_reviews.author: SirWill90

customer_reviews.title: Power!
customer_reviews.text: Stepping up from an old three head Norelco. Was really hesitant to spend the extra but very very glad I did. Everybodys skin and hair is different, for me, the Norelco would struggle through my course stubble and occasionally grab a hair and pull it...now thats a great sales gimmick for saying you're getting a close shave but when its your stubble getting yanked, it is not fun...!! The Braun is definitely a little louder in operation, but not annoyingly so....where it shines is power! Grinds right through my tough stubble without a single yank. I went ahead and got the cleaning base, it absolutely works and is convenient but you can easily clean your shaver without it.
customer_reviews.author: Ketzerbuilt

customer_reviews.title: Great shaver. Well worth the rather high price.
customer_reviews.text: So far, by far, this is the best shaver I have ever had. I shave my head and face every morning. This shaver gets both closer than any I have used in the past. I love the clean and charge station. Everything about this design is top notch.
customer_reviews.author: BRUCE KALIN

customer_reviews.title: smooth
customer_reviews.text: I must admit, this thing is all everyone is saying it is, and more. I found this electric shaver to be quite, smooth and comfortable just like the box says. I am a old remington user and am used to these micro screens but the remington is nothing like this. the old Remington Hyper Series XF8700 Advanced Wet or Dry Foil Shaver started being ruff right away and never got very close. and as for those pesky grey hairs it's a dream. I would recommend this shaver to anyone who enjoys great shaves with an electric razor.
customer_reviews.author: Jan K.

customer_reviews.title: BRAUN is the best
customer_reviews.text: Braun is the best a man can get, been using since 2years now almost every day and the battery lasts 1month after full charge, as of now the battery is still going good and I haven't seen a drop gives a smooth shave just in 30secs more than worth for the buy life much better now with BRAUN gifted to my dad and he is so happy
customer_reviews.author: sharatmuthyala

customer_reviews.title: No better no worse, just pricey.
customer_reviews.text: Very expensive and I didn't even get the chrome one. It's fancy and charges Quik. I thought the digital on the front was battery level instead it's how long you have to finish shave. Only bars any other time. I bought it for the digital, and chrome. Shaves as good as my series 3 and two older ones.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry C.

customer_reviews.title: Very good shave
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my deteriorating series 6 with this. Quieter, slightly better shave, but trimmer, although "improved" and sturdier, still does not trim sideburns well. Must go over the sideburns repeatedly to get the bottom edge clean. Otherwise would be an expensive 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Huge rip off
customer_reviews.text: This thing is absolute garbage. This is maybe the second review I've ever written, that's how strongly I felt to steer people away from this huge disappointment. I have curly and coarse hair and this doesn't cut it, like literally at all. Even if I go over the same spot like 20 times it still leaves hairs behind. And all the while it's made my ingrown hairs and face acne worse. Such a waste of over $300. My Norelco from 2003 works better than this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it if you shave daily.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this razor as an upgrade to my Braun Series 5 that I’ve used for over three years. I have very coarse facial hair, and shave daily. The series 5 will do the job. However, the series 9 is a MUCH more comfortable shave. Additionally, the 9 feels like it has a much more powerful motor, and the foils feel like they stay much cooler when compared to my 5. As far as shaving time, I definitely saved a few minutes using the 9. Less passes over the same spot helps with that. I’m sure other razors will get the job done, but for someone who has tricky facial hair, this is a worthwhile investment.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Fastest Shave Ever
customer_reviews.text: Series 9 9290cc Electric Shaver works exceptionally well, giving a close shave in half the time of other shavers that I have used. The docking station cleans the shaver well and the cartridges last longer that I expected. The Braun website has excellent instructional videos.
customer_reviews.author: Hobart M. King

customer_reviews.title: Braun Flagship with OKAY Build Quality
customer_reviews.text: Undeniably, it is one of the best shavers in the market. However, the build quality is mediocre for its high price tag. It uses metal imitated plastic. I understand that there are many reasons for that: lightweight portability and COST saving. I would still recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: An electric will never be better than a regular razor
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be the one that would make me get rid of my blades for good. It is not. There is something about an electric razor that just will not get all hairs off the neck and jawline. I will continue to have to use a real razor to get a clean landscape then use this to maintain, but do not think that after a weekend this will make your face anywhere near presentable on Monday. That said for electrics, this is definitely a good one.
customer_reviews.author: Justus Self-Medlin

customer_reviews.title: Can be used on elderly men
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one that I have bought. I bought one for my dad that is 94 and it works great for the older generation. I’ve had mine a few years now and the battery is running great and the foul has not worn out. I shave 3 times a week and have not had a problem. I also bought the series under mine and it does not perform nearly as well. Don’t be cheap and spend a little more and buy this unit. Good luck
customer_reviews.author: Robert R.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent close shaving razor
customer_reviews.text: This razor is excellent and very close shaving without razor burn. I have used Norelco for many years and this razor shaves much closer and better. I have the unit with the cleaner and that is great. I got it as a Christmas present and it totally exceeds my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: MN_EE

product_meta.title: Braun Electric Razor for Men, Series 9 9370cc Electric Shaver With Precision Trimmer, Rechargeable, Wet & Dry Foil Shaver, Clean & Charge Station & Travel Case
product_meta.description: Style:9370ccBraun Series 9 is the world’s most efficient electric shaver. The 5 shaving elements capture more hair in one stroke for a flawless shave. This foil shaver provides you with both a close and gentle shave, without compromise. The electric razor for men glides over skin and is suitable for wet or dry shaving. You can now shave cordlessly for longer (60 min) with 20% more battery than the previous Series 9. All Series 9 shavers are made in Germany with premium craftsmanship. Product recommended by GQ magazine
feature_bullets: World’s most efficient electric shaver*. Efficient, close and gentle, for a flawless shave
Best efficiency: 5 shaving elements get more hair in one stroke than any other shavers
Best for gentleness: sonic vibrations glide over your skin for maximum skin comfort
Use wet or dry. Now with 20% more battery power
Product designed, engineered and made in Germany. Recommended by GQ and the Skin Health Alliance accredited
*Tested on 3-day beard vs. leading premium tier products. **vs. previous Series 9"

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
